mapper.select: SELECT URL,AUTHORITY FROM ( SELECT A.USR_ORDER AS LEV , NVL( CASE D.MN_PAGEDIV_C WHEN 'SC_QXCFB' THEN CONCAT(D.MN_URL,'/**') ELSE D.MN_URL END , A.USR_PATTERN) AS URL , C.UIA_NAME AS AUTHORITY FROM U_USERINFO_SECURED_RESOURCE A LEFT JOIN U_USERINFO_RESOURCE_AUTHORITY B ON A.USR_KEYNO = B.USR_KEYNO LEFT JOIN U_USERINFO_AUTHORITY C ON B.UIA_KEYNO = C.UIA_KEYNO LEFT JOIN S_MENU_MANAGER D ON A.USR_MN_KEYNO = D.MN_KEYNO WHERE A.USR_KEYNO = B.USR_KEYNO AND (D.MN_DEL_YN IS NULL OR D.MN_DEL_YN = 'N') AND A.USR_UIR_KEYNO = 'UIR_0000000019' ORDER BY A.USR_ORDER ) AA WHERE AA.URL IS NOT NULL ORDER BY LEV, URL
